summary: An Ordinance providing for the improvement of the Alley between First Avenue and Second Avenue, from Stewart Street to Virginia Street, all in the City of Seattle, by paving the same with brick, all in accordance with Resolution No. 2315 of the City Council of the City of Seattle, and providing for the payment therefor by the mode of "Payment by Bonds," as provided by the laws of the State of Washington and the Charter and Ordinances of the City of Seattle
